alert.note: Alert for Conway; Perry; Pope; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 5:26PM CDT until June 14 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Perry County in central Arkansas... Southwestern Conway County in central Arkansas... Central Yell County in central Arkansas... South central Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 525 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Danville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Danville... Ola... Adona... Petit Jean State Park... Carden Bottoms... Plainview in Yell County... Petit Jean River WMA... Casa... Aplin... Corinth... Birta... Carter Cove Park... Lakeview in Yell County... Nimrod... Deberrie... Pontoon... Kingston... Centerville... Rover... Fourche Junction... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
